name: Frost Byte
description: Frost Byte (FBYT) is a versatile multi-chain token designed to facilitate seamless transactions across various blockchain networks. With its precision of 4 decimals, FBYT ensures accurate and efficient handling of digital assets. It addresses the challenge of interoperability by enabling smooth and secure cross-chain transfers, making it ideal for decentralized applications and cross-chain integrations. Frost Byte is the future of interconnected blockchain ecosystems, providing a robust solution for unified digital asset management.
